mapper.insert: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW map.v_convenience_store_geojson AS WITH dedup AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (x, y) objt_id, fclty_nm, adres, rn_adres, x, y, geom FROM map.convenience_store WHERE geom IS NOT NULL ORDER BY x, y, objt_id DESC -- 같은 (x,y) 안에서 objt_id가 가장 큰 행 선택 ), feat AS ( SELECT json_build_object( 'type','Feature', 'id', 'map:convenience_store.' || objt_id::text, 'geometry', ST_AsGeoJSON(geom)::json, 'properties', json_build_object( 'fclty_nm', fclty_nm, 'adres', adres, 'rn_adres', rn_adres, 'x', x, 'y', y ) ) AS feature FROM dedup ) SELECT json_build_object( 'type','FeatureCollection', 'features', COALESCE(json_agg(feature), '[]'::json) ) AS geojson FROM feat

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW map.v_government_office_geojson AS WITH dedup AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (x_coord, y_coord) objt_id, fclty_nm, fclty_ty, fclty_cd, adres, rn_adres, telno, ctprvn_cd, sgg_cd, emd_cd, x_coord, y_coord, data_yr, geom FROM map.government_office WHERE geom IS NOT NULL ORDER BY x_coord, y_coord, objt_id DESC ), feat AS ( SELECT json_build_object( 'type', 'Feature', 'id', 'map:government_office.' || objt_id::text, 'geometry', ST_AsGeoJSON(geom)::json, 'properties', json_build_object( 'objt_id', objt_id, 'fclty_nm', fclty_nm, 'fclty_ty', fclty_ty, 'fclty_cd', fclty_cd, 'adres', adres, 'rn_adres', rn_adres, 'telno', telno, 'ctprvn_cd', ctprvn_cd, 'sgg_cd', sgg_cd, 'emd_cd', emd_cd, 'x_coord', x_coord, 'y_coord', y_coord, 'data_yr', data_yr ) ) AS feature FROM dedup ) SELECT json_build_object( 'type', 'FeatureCollection', 'features', COALESCE(json_agg(feature), '[]'::json) ) AS geojson FROM feat
